The name of the resource group.
The name of the VM scale set.
The parameter to request non-graceful VM shutdown. True value for this flag indicates non-graceful shutdown whereas false indicates otherwise. Default value for this flag is false if not specified
The virtual machine scale set instance ids. Omitting the virtual machine scale set instance ids will result in the operation being performed on all virtual machines in the virtual machine scale set.
The cancellation token.
Docs.summary: Power off (stop) one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set. Note that resources are still attached and you are getting charged for the resources. Instead, use deallocate to release resources and avoid charges.

The virtual machine scale set instance ids.
The cancellation token.
Docs.summary: Upgrades one or more virtual machines to the latest SKU set in the VM scale set model.
